title: How To Use A Man's Necktie
alternative_title: [矛X盾短編選] その男のネクタイ使用法〜あなたのファンタジーを叶えます〜 ; [군림VS굴림 단편선] 그 남자의 넥타이 사용법
status: [矛X盾短編選] その男のネクタイ使用法〜あなたのファンタジーを叶えます〜 ; [군림VS굴림 단편선] 그 남자의 넥타이 사용법
description:
Description :
        Brought to you by Konbini Scans! Follow us on discord: https://discord.gg/FBHJMm5PJ6Due to his father's debt, Park Woojin and Cha Taesung met as debtor and debt collector. After many twists and turns, the two gradually became romantically involved. They'd have a smooth-sailing relationship, even though Taesung could be a bit possessive. The only issue was that during s**, Woojin would have flashbacks of Taesung strangling him, causing Woojin to fall out of the moment. One day, a mysterious note along with a necktie arrived for Woojin  When he tries it on Taesung, Woojin witnesses its thrilling powers!?
